tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I'm very very proud to be his teacher in school. I visited him for my muscle stretch in the back. His touch is MIDAS touch. I was completely normal in two weeks. My husband was knocked down by a motorcyclist and had neck femur fracture in the left leg. Thursday my husband fell, Friday Dr Hitesh operated on him and Saturday he was able to walk with Walker. Hats off to him.
Dear Hitesh you have once again proved HKS means *Hitesh Kubadia Special* touch HEALS. God bless you always and may you succeed in every operation you perform. Love you dear. Lots of love and blessings kulkarniteacher.

tags: None
review: Very smart, smiling, jolly energetic doctor. does not get tired to answer patient's 100 querries. Before operaion,his sweet polite words removes patient's mental tension and gets prepared, ready mentally & physically for the operation.  Opration is carried out with minimum muscles cutting so that recovery and healing is faster. During opertation his smiling face gives confidence & patience to patient to sustain major operation. Even after operation he was loving & care takiing and gave visits to patient in the hospital to ensure that patient is in comfortable condition with bearable pains and all other things going smoothly. At all this time he was so friendly that we felt that he is our close relative or a member of our family. We wish him great success & happy life in future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: * ***** ** ** *** ** *** **** ******** H is amazing .. i would recommend him to everyone .. his work is fabulous . We had gone through a knee replacement surgery by him and its unbelievable how there is no pain and no problem in walking and other activities.

tags: None
review: I always went to him with acute unbearable pain and a list of complains but always very patiently he hears everything and assures  that all will be fine soon.  He makes sure  that in any condition  surgery would always be the last option.  Thank you doctor for always making me feel so comfortable even with so much pain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Hitesh is a very good and jovial person. The patient gets cured by just talking to the doctor. He checked me thoroughly and finally on asking for medicine PRESCRIPTION patted on my back and said "medicine for what".? You have nothing. 
Yet he suggested some tests and asked to come with reports. I hope that problems if any will be resolved through his treatment . Thanks a lot doctor.  Waiting to see you with the test reports soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering from knee & hip arthritis had been to 2 doctors earlier then found Dr Kubadia online met him he explained very patiently about the options i opted for the physiotherapy option & its been 9 months & i have been 90% cured of my pain thanks to Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,

review: Dr Hitesh is very polite and friendly. He knows his job very well. He takes care of the details while explaining things. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It is not just me but even my wife Meera Joshi has been treated by Dr Hitesh Kubadia. She has been his patient since 2009 and he did cure her not just of her spasm but the sciatica has not triggered since 2009. I am being treated for my lumber problem and have been treated for my cervical too. Besides the two of us Dr Hitesh has also treated successfully my nephew who had come from Siliguri Master Himanshu Joshi for his fracture of the spine. Hence he has been more of a family physician for us.

tags: None
review: I was very scared to even consult a doctor from fear of surgery but doctor hitesh counselled me and helped me overcome my fears and anxiety and explained how regular exercises can go a long way  in keeping myself fit. Also explained how TKR can help lead a better ageing life.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
a) Would have expected the doctor to explain a bit more the ligament tear and why the inflammation happened
b) While Dr Hitesh did the whole treatment well, I could not find the required level of comfort during the entire process. Felt very transactional
c) Reached at 4 30 pm for my 4 45 appointment but the doctors only came at 5 30 - maybe the system could have informed me in advance of the delay
reply_text: Our sincere apologies to the inconvenience caused to you. Though at times the circumstances tend to become unavoidable as we are in an emergency field. Will definitely keep your valuable feedback in mind. Thank you.
